content.raw:
I'm looking into version compatibility for the tutorial:

Gazebo version | GzWeb branch | NodeJS version | Status
------------------------ | ---------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------
7 | 1.3.0 | 0.10 | Compatible, see [pipelines](#!/osrf/gzweb/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/198)
8 | 1.3.0 | 0.10 | Compatible, that's currently the default on pipelines
9 | 1.3.0 | 0.10 | Compatible, with deprecation warnings, tested locally against gz9 prerelease
7 | default | 4.2.6 | Compatible, see [pipelines](#!/osrf/gzweb/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/199)
8 | default | 4.2.6 | Compatible, that's currently the default on pipelines
9 | default | 4.2.6 | Compatible, with deprecation warnings, tested locally against gz9 prerelease
content.html:
I'm looking into version compatibility for the tutorial:

Gazebo version GzWeb branch NodeJS version Status
7 1.3.0 0.10 Compatible, see pipelines
8 1.3.0 0.10 Compatible, that's currently the default on pipelines
9 1.3.0 0.10 Compatible, with deprecation warnings, tested locally against gz9 prerelease
7 default 4.2.6 Compatible, see pipelines
8 default 4.2.6 Compatible, that's currently the default on pipelines
9 default 4.2.6 Compatible, with deprecation warnings, tested locally against gz9 prerelease
